Function Documentation

int count_tuple_space ( struct tuple_list *  templates,
struct context *  ctx,
int *  result 
)

This works just like dump_tuple_space, but instead of sending back a list of all the matching tuples, we just send back a count of how many tuples match.

struct tuple_list* dump_tuple_space ( struct tuple_list *  templates,
struct context *  ctx 
) [read]

Transmit a list of templates to the server, with an op code of DUMP. The server will respond by sending back a list of the matching tuples.

Variable Documentation

int i_am_server = 0

This flag tells whether or not the current executable is the tuple server. If it is, then broken pipes on sockets should not crash the executable.

Doxygen likes LaTeX-flavored math:
